item.title: 收购公司首席执行官称二级市场可防止私募股权投资崩溃
item.description: 一家由欧洲超级富豪家族支持的私募股权公司的首席执行官对该行业发出了严厉的警告，称只有蓬勃发展的所谓二级市场才能将该行业从巨大的衰退中拯救出来。【原文：The CEO of a private equity firm backed by a group of ultra-wealthy European families gave a stark warning on the industry, saying only the booming so-called secondaries market is rescuing it from a huge downturn.】

item.title: 英特尔赢得 1.4 亿欧元减免欧盟创纪录罚单残余部分
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）赢得了近 1.4 亿欧元（1.63 亿美元）的欧盟反垄断罚款减免。【原文：Intel Corp. won a near-€140 million ($163 million) reduction in what remained of a once-record European Union antitrust fine.】

item.title: 南非与亿万富翁拉宗的 ICTSI 公司签署港口协议
item.description: 南非港口和物流公司 Transnet SOC Ltd.与菲律宾亿万富翁恩里克-拉宗（Enrique Razon）领导的一家公司签署了一项特许权协议，以扩建位于德班的非洲大陆顶级集装箱枢纽的主要码头。【原文：South African port and logistics firm Transnet SOC Ltd. signed a concession agreement with a company headed by Filipino billionaire Enrique Razon to expand the main terminal at the continent’s top container hub in Durban.】

item.title: 由于担心 NKD 零售采购的价值，Mr 价格下滑
item.description: 由于市场担心这家南非服装连锁店为拓展中欧和东欧市场而为 NKD 集团的零售业务支付了过高的价格，普莱斯先生集团有限公司（Mr Price Group Ltd.）的跌幅创下历史之最。【原文：Mr Price Group Ltd. slumped the most on record amid market concerns that the South African clothing chain is overpaying for the retail business of NKD Group to expand in central and eastern Europe.】

item.title: 中国多晶硅巨头联手解决产能过剩问题
item.description: 据公司注册数据显示，中国几家主要的多晶硅生产商已经成立了一家合资企业，以帮助缓解太阳能供应链中所用原材料的产能过剩问题。【原文：Several major Chinese polysilicon producers have set up a joint venture to help ease overcapacity in the raw material used in the solar supply chain, according to company registration data.】

item.title: 汇丰银行将支付约 3 亿美元和解法国刑事案件
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，汇丰控股公司准备支付约 3 亿美元，以了结一桩法国刑事案件，该案涉及汇丰被控在 "Cum-Cum "税务丑闻中扮演的角色。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is poised to pay around $300 million to settle a French criminal case into its alleged role in the “Cum-Cum” tax scandal that’s embroiled some of the biggest banks in the country, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: CPC 系泊设备维修工作持续进行，哈萨克斯坦石油供应面临风险
item.description: 由于黑海的一个重要出口系泊设施的维修工作久拖不决，哈萨克斯坦的石油生产面临停产风险。【原文：Kazakhstan’s oil production is at risk of curtailment as repair work to a critical export mooring in the Black Sea drags on.】

item.title: 巴黎法院撤销与苏禄继承人 150 亿美元争执中的最终裁决，马来西亚说
item.description: 据马来西亚政府称，巴黎一家法院已宣布所谓的苏禄继承人要求马来西亚赔偿约 150 亿美元的裁决无效，这标志着长期领土争端中的一个重要里程碑。【原文：A Paris court has annulled the award of about $15 billion sought by the so-called heirs of Sulu against Malaysia, according to the Malaysian government, marking a major milestone in the longstanding dispute over territorial claims.】

item.title: 预算案公布前数月伯克利英国房屋销售下滑
item.description: 伯克利集团控股公司（Berkeley Group Holdings Plc）表示，在预算案公布前的几个月里，该公司在英国的房屋销售量有所下降，并警告说，该公司尚未看到为支持更多开发而放宽法规的承诺所带来的成果。【原文：Berkeley Group Holdings Plc said its UK home sales declined in the months leading into the budget and warned it has yet to see the fruits of a promised push to ease regulations to support more development.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦认为没有理由很快加息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲央行可能会在下周的会议上将借贷成本维持在当前水平，因此没有理由很快加息。【原文：The European Central Bank has no reason to raise interest rates soon after probably holding borrowing costs at their current level at a meeting next week, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织敦促中国采取更大胆的刺激措施以重新平衡经济和贸易
item.description: 国际货币基金组织上调了对中国经济增长的预测，并呼吁中国政府采取 "更有力的一揽子政策"，使中国经济减少对出口和投资的依赖。【原文：The International Monetary Fund upgraded forecasts for China’s growth and called for a “more forceful policy package” from Beijing to make its economy less dependent on exports and investment.】

item.title: 生态世界发展公司 2025 年销售额创历史新高，超过预期目标
item.description: 受高端服务式公寓、商铺写字楼和工业用地交易需求强劲的推动，生态世界发展集团有限公司（Eco World Development Group Bhd.【原文：Eco World Development Group Bhd. full-year sales surged to a record, surpassing the group’s own target by 30%, driven by stronger demand for its high-end serviced apartments, shop offices and industrial land deals.】

item.title: 欧洲央行西姆库斯认为经济意外走强不会再减息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员吉迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，在经济活动和通胀均强于预期之后，无需进一步降低利率。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus said interest rates don’t need to be lowered further after economic activity and inflation both turned out stronger than expected.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行加入银行竞争对手行列，收购联合金融科技公司股份
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）正在收购一家专门从事银行技术的英国-丹麦金融科技公司的股份，加入了包括其四家大型欧美竞争对手在内的投资集团。【原文：Barclays Plc is buying a stake in a British-Danish fintech company specializing in banking technology, joining an investor group that includes four of its large European and US rivals.】

item.title: 埃及通胀出人意料地放缓，降息压力增大
item.description: 即使在削减燃料补贴后，埃及的通胀仍略有放缓，这可能给当局在 12 月 25 日降低利率提供了更大的空间。【原文：Egyptian inflation slightly slowed even after a cut in fuel subsidies, potentially giving authorities more scope to reduce interest rates on Dec. 25.】

item.title: 日本和中国在雷达使用问题上仍有分歧，美国也加入进来
item.description: 日本和中国仍在进行指责游戏，日本抱怨中国没有提供足够的有关中国军事演习的信息，这次演习据称导致中国使用火控雷达对付日本战斗机。【原文：Japan and China remain locked in a blame game, with Japan complaining that China did not provide enough information on a Chinese military exercise that led to an alleged use of fire-control radar against Japanese fighter jets.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数将下跌，英镑上涨
中国房地产股因政策和万科债务希望而反弹
item.description: 由于对新政策刺激的猜测以及对中国万科债务重组谈判取得进展的押注，中国房地产股大涨。【原文：Chinese property stocks surged on speculation of new policy stimulus and bets on progress in China Vanke Co.’s debt-restructuring talks.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行印度分行行长称印度部分 IPO 定价错误
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）印度分部首席执行官普拉莫德-库马尔（Pramod Kumar）表示，印度一级市场的亢奋情绪正在导致一些公司对其首次公开发行股票进行错误定价，从而促使投资者保持谨慎。【原文：A euphoria in India’s primary markets is leading some companies to misprice their initial public offerings, prompting investor caution, according to Pramod Kumar, chief executive officer of Barclays Plc’s India unit.】

item.title: 荷兰 Aegon 保险公司进军美国，将更名为 Transamerica
item.description: 总部设在荷兰的保险公司 Aegon Ltd.（该公司的大部分利润来自美国）确认将把总部迁往美国，并更名为 Transamerica Inc.【原文：Aegon Ltd., the Netherlands-based insurer which generates the majority of its profit from the US, confirmed that it will move its headquarters there and rename itself Transamerica Inc.】

item.title: 华尔街采用人工智能将推动招聘热潮，目前如此
item.description: 机器人还不会来抢你的饭碗。【原文：The robots aren’t coming for your job, yet.】

item.title: 中国芯片设计商摩尔芯线跃升，新产品助推涨势
item.description: 摩尔芯线科技有限公司（Moore Threads Technology Co.【原文：Moore Threads Technology Co. shares jumped as much as 27% in Shanghai on Wednesday after the recent market debutant said it would release new artificial intelligence chip products next week.】

item.title: 韩国发生史上最大数据泄露事件后，Coupang 首席执行官辞职
item.description: Coupang Inc.该公司发生了该国有史以来最大的数据泄露事件，3000 多万人的个人数据遭到泄露，公司首席执行官 Park Dae-jun 已辞职。【原文：Coupang Inc. Chief Executive Officer Park Dae-jun has resigned after the company incurred the country’s largest-ever data breach, in which the personal data of more than 30 million people was compromised.】

item.title: 芯片挤压担忧加剧，任天堂市值缩水 140 亿美元
item.description: 任天堂公司（Nintendo Co., Ltd.）的股价周三下滑达 4.7%，创下自 5 月份以来的最低水平，原因是人们担心包括内存芯片在内的零部件价格飙升将侵蚀其利润。【原文：Nintendo Co.’s shares slid as much as 4.7% Wednesday to their lowest level since May, weighed down by concerns that the surging price of components including memory chips will erode its profit.】

item.title: 特朗普 2.0 急于避免重蹈 1.0 的覆辙
item.description:
可负担性和第二年市场调整的重演笼罩在中期选举的上空。【原文：

Affordability and a repeat of second-year market corrections hang over the midterms.

】

item.title: 欧元就业竞赛为希腊提供了象征性复兴的机会
item.description: 希腊财政部长竞聘管理希腊债务危机曾经爆发的同一论坛，希腊即将面临欧元区复兴道路上最具象征意义的考验。【原文：Greece is about to face the most symbolic test yet on its road to euro-area rehabilitation as its finance minister bids to run the same forum where the country’s debt crisis once played out.】

item.title: 失望交易 "推动全球债券收益率升至 2009 年水平
item.description: 在美联储召开重要政策会议之前，全球债券收益率已升至 2009 年以来的最高点，表明人们担心从美国到澳大利亚的降息周期可能很快结束。【原文：Global bond yields have risen to highs last seen in 2009 ahead of a key Federal Reserve policy meeting, signaling concerns that interest-rate cutting cycles from the US to Australia may be ending soon.】

item.title: 油价下跌，美国假日公路旅行预计将创纪录
item.description: 随着油价跌至自大流行病以来的最低点，预计将有创纪录数量的美国人在 12 月假期期间驾车出行。【原文：A record number of Americans are expected to hit the road over the December holiday period as gas prices slide to lows not seen since the pandemic.】

item.title: 英国 Nu Quantum 公司融资 6000 万美元，国家电网领投
item.description: Nu Quantum 是一家英国初创公司，致力于构建连接和扩展量子计算机的网络基础设施，该公司在英国最大的 A 轮融资中筹集了 6000 万美元，投资者押注于前沿技术的发展。【原文：Nu Quantum, a British startup that builds networking infrastructure to link and scale quantum computers, raised $60 million in one of the largest Series A rounds raised in the UK, as investors bet on advances in the frontier technology.】

item.title: 亚马逊将印度投资承诺提高至 2030 年 350 亿美元
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）承诺在未来五年内向印度投资 350 亿美元，增加在这一重要增长市场的支出，以拓展从快速商务到云计算的业务。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. pledged to invest $35 billion in India over the next five years, boosting its spending in the key growth market to expand in businesses from quick commerce to cloud computing.】
